org.esupportail.commons.services.exceptionHandling
Class SimpleExceptionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractI18nAwareBean
      org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractApplicationAwareBean
          org.esupportail.commons.services.exceptionHandling.SimpleExceptionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ExceptionService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmailExceptionServiceImpl
public class SimpleExceptionServiceImpl
extends AbstractApplicationAwareBean
implements ExceptionService

A simple implementation of ExceptionService, that just logs the exceptions and redirect to an throwable page. See /properties/exceptionHandling/exceptionHandling-example.xml.

See Also:

handleException

public void handleException()
                     throws ExceptionHandlingException
Description copied from interface: ExceptionService
Handle an exception. Implementing classes can do anything with the exception, such as loggin it, send a report to an email address, ...

Specified by:
